body_html:
Here is an CPU version of pytorch stn module: https://github.com/fxia22/stn.pytorch adapted from torch version.
In the meantime I am working on the GPU version of that.

--edit--
GPU version added.

body:
Here is an CPU version of pytorch stn module: https://github.com/fxia22/stn.pytorch adapted from torch version.
In the meantime I am working on the GPU version of that. 

--edit--
GPU version added.
